title: Is LoL Planning on Having More Marai Champions?
body:
{{champion:267}} Nami is my most favourite champion in League of Legends, I have been waiting to see if more Marai would be making an appearance and hoping!

Is there any plans to create more champions akin to Nami?

replies.body: I hope so! I'm working on a concept for such a champion (An ADC that would match Nami rather well, ironically), and the problem I most realized when designing such a champion is how they would move on land! Not all Marai are capable of manipulating the tides like Nami, she holds the unique privilege of such, but I think its definitely an interesting idea to explore!

{{champion:267}} Yeah, I think it's been said that other creatures live with the Marai and in the oceans of Runeterra (see Fizz) and I would really love to see some more along that vein. More Marai would be preferrable and it could be that Nami manipulates it for them, or perhaps they have a way to transform to appear more humanoid in some ways and spells push them into Marai for (think Gnar's transformation but more slinky and wateresque).

I think there's a lot of ways they could manipulate it to make it work, but they are such a cool idea set/species/race of champions that I think it would be a waste for it to JUST be Nami (no matter how amazing she is).

Who knows with the retcon of the lore though, lol.

Chances for a new Marai champ are kinda slim.
With the way champs are added,every new champ tries to be something different than everyone else.

Bard is a shinto god,Rek'sai a burrowing monster,kalista a vengeful spirit,gnar a caveman/hulk-guy,azir an emporer/sand-mage/Ra-dude,etc.

The marai are most likely a merfolk and well Nami is already the mermaid champ,so there is little space for another one.

That doesn't mean a Marai champ is completely out of question,he/she would just need to be different enough in terms of Namis general archetype(which is being a merfolk/mermaid-champ).
For example if there'd be a marai with the lower body of an octopus,that would most likely be different enough from nami,but would raise the question if octopus dude is something cool enough to have in the game.

Perhaps a Corrupted Marai of some sorts (more monsterous features- Sharp teeth, octopus stuff, shark stuff, etc.- Maybe something similar to Dota's Slardar)? :P
I have some more ideas but they aren't very solid, but yeah, I think that a Corrupted Marai could really work.
Yeah someone who is more focused on representing different kinds of iconic deep sea creatures would probably work
